mapper.insert: insert into t_user(account_name, account_pwd, type, email, company, contact_name, contact_tel, qq, website, createtime,status) values(#{userName}, md5(#{password}), #{type}, #{email},#{company}, #{contactName}, #{contactTel}, #{qq}, #{website}, now(),#{status})
mapper.select: select * from t_user where account_name=#{userName} and (account_pwd=md5(#{password}) or login_token=#{loginToken}) and status=1
mapper.update: update t_user set login_token=#{loginToken}, login_token_time=now() where uid=#{uid}
